title: 12/28/20 – DPS - Best Of
itunes:title: 12/28/20 – DPS - Best Of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and LaVar Arrington fill in for Dan Patrick and talk about the two teams that seem to be on a collision course for the Super Bowl. Plus, they speak with Ed Bouchette of The Athletic about the Steelers’ impressive comeback over the Colts on Sunday! They talk about the end of the Dwayne Haskins era in Washington and speak with Brian Costello of the New York Post about what the Jets plan to do with the #2 pick in the NFL Draft!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
